items.name: Crest of Cinders
items.desc:
Deal 8% bonus damage.

Attacks 3% Burn and 50% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

items.name: Steadfast Heart
items.desc: Take 8% less damage. While above 50% Health, take 15% less damage, instead.

items.name: Legacy of the Colossus
items.desc: Take 12% less damage. While above 40% Health, take 18% less damage, instead.

items.name: Battlecast Plating
items.desc: The wearer gains the Battlecast trait.

items.name: Blade of the Ruined King
items.desc: Wearer is also a Blademaster

items.name: Celestial Orb
items.desc: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

items.name: Dark Star's Heart
items.desc: The wearer gains the Dark Star trait.

items.name: Infiltrator's Talons
items.desc: The wearer gains the Infiltrator trait.

items.name: Protector's Chestguard
items.desc: The wearer gains the Protector trait.

items.name: Rebel Medal
items.desc: The wearer gains the Rebel trait.

items.name: Star Guardian's Charm
items.desc: The wearer gains the Star Guardian trait.
